description: Media & Games Invest plc is a strategic investment holding company. The firm operates through segments such as Gaming segment and Media segment. The firm through Gaming segment offers massively multiplayer online games (MMOs) and casual games. These include various role playing, strategy and shooter MMOs, including ArcheAge Unchained, Aura Kingdom, Desert Operations, Grand Fantasia, Fiesta Online and Trove. The Media segment offers products and services in the field of digital advertising. The Media segment is combined under the Verve Group, Inc, which focuses on the areas of advertisement-technology (programmatic advertising) and influencer and social media marketing.
name: Media and Games Invest SE
